properly.translation[0].definitions[0].d: correctly, or in a way that is considered right
properly.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The brakes don’t seem to be working properly.
Then he’s not doing his job properly.
Parents should teach their children to behave properly in public.
properly.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The allegations were never properly investigated.
properly.translation[0].definitions[2].e: Documents properly belonging to the family were taken away.
It isn’t, properly speaking, a real science.
properly.translation[0].definitions[3].d: used to say that someone is right to do something
properly.translation[0].definitions[3].e: People are, quite properly, proud of their homes.
